p: Yu et al. [ 110] used oleanolic acid 3-O- Î²-D-glucuronopyranoside (OAGP) as the raw material, after amidation at the C-28 position and modification of the sugar group, the resulting compound 6d ( Figure 9). Pretreatment of H9c2 cells with compound 6d exhibited a better protective effect than OAGP. The survival rate increased from 49.69% (with H 2O 2 treatment alone) to 58.69%, but the effect is not as good as derivatives of ursolic acid skeleton. In summary, the experimental results showed that the amidation of C-28 and the connection of isobutyl are beneficial for the cardiomyocytes protection.
